# Carly Gage Photography

> Friendly Dallas family photographer based in Flower Mound, specializing in authentic, stress-free family sessions, maternity photos, and mini sessions. Serving families across the entire Dallas-Fort Worth metroplex.

## Core Content

- [Home](https://carlygage.com/): The main hub featuring services, portfolio galleries, and information about stress-free family photography sessions.
- [Services](https://carlygage.com/#services): Four session types - Family Sessions, Maternity, Baby Announcement, and Mini Sessions with details on duration, images included, and locations.
- [About](https://carlygage.com/#about): Meet Carly - patient, playful photographer who captures real family moments in Flower Mound, Frisco, Southlake, and throughout DFW.
- [Portfolio](https://carlygage.com/#portfolios): Real families, real moments, real joy. Galleries showcasing authentic family photography.
- [Contact](https://carlygage.com/#contact): Inquiry form to book sessions or ask questions. Quick response within 24 hours.
- [FAQ](https://carlygage.com/#faq): Common questions about session timing, locations, what to wear, and service areas.

## Portfolio Galleries

- [Dallas Family Session](https://carlygage.com/portfolio/dallas-family-session): Authentic family moments captured in natural settings.
- [Dallas Maternity Session](https://carlygage.com/portfolio/dallas-maternity-session): Beautiful pregnancy portraits celebrating the journey.
- [Dallas Baby Announcement](https://carlygage.com/portfolio/dallas-baby-announcement): Creative sessions for sharing exciting news.
- [Dallas Mini Session](https://carlygage.com/portfolio/dallas-mini-session): Quick 20-minute sessions perfect for busy families.

## Service Areas (Location Pages)

- [Flower Mound Family Photographer](https://carlygage.com/locations/flower-mound-family-photographer): Based in Flower Mound, serving local families with beautiful park and natural area sessions.
- [Frisco Family Photographer](https://carlygage.com/locations/frisco-family-photographer): Stress-free family sessions in Frisco's beautiful parks and community spaces.
- [Southlake Family Photographer](https://carlygage.com/locations/southlake-family-photographer): Authentic, joyful photography for Southlake families.
- [Plano Family Photographer](https://carlygage.com/locations/plano-family-photographer): Serving Plano families with warm, patient photography.
- [McKinney Family Photographer](https://carlygage.com/locations/mckinney-family-photographer): Historic charm and natural beauty for McKinney family sessions.
- [Grapevine Family Photographer](https://carlygage.com/locations/grapevine-family-photographer): Beautiful lake settings and community spaces in Grapevine.
- [Coppell Family Photographer](https://carlygage.com/locations/coppell-family-photographer): Authentic, stress-free photography for Coppell families.
- [Colleyville Family Photographer](https://carlygage.com/locations/colleyville-family-photographer): Warm, patient photography celebrating Colleyville families.
- [Highland Park Family Photographer](https://carlygage.com/locations/highland-park-family-photographer): Serving Highland Park and University Park families.
- [Prosper Family Photographer](https://carlygage.com/locations/prosper-family-photographer): Relaxed, fun photography for Prosper families.

## Session Types

**Family Sessions**: One hour at a beautiful location. Focus on play, laughter, and connection. 40 edited images included.

**Maternity Sessions**: Relaxed one-hour session celebrating pregnancy. Two outfit changes allowed. Partners always welcome.

**Baby Announcement**: One-hour creative session to capture excitement. Perfect for social media and keepsakes. 40 edited images.

**Mini Sessions**: Short, sweet, and simple. 20-minute session delivering 10 beautiful images. Perfect for milestones and busy families.

## Key Information

- **Base Location**: Flower Mound, Texas
- **Service Area**: Entire Dallas-Fort Worth metroplex
- **Style**: Authentic, joyful, stress-free photography
- **Approach**: Patient, playful, capturing real moments
- **Response Time**: Within 24 hours for inquiries
- **Booking**: Available for 2026 sessions
